author: aching
msg: Start the communication service in BspJob after the initial (-1)
barrier to allow partitions to be set.  Save the configuration
locally in BspJob.  Fix cleanup of ZooKeeper files prior to
startup of ZooKeeper.  Clean up ZooKeeper files after shutdown. [ahing]

author: aching
msg: If prop.zookeeper.list is not set, no ZooKeeperExt tests will be run.  In the future, ZooKeeper can be started on the fly to do these tests.

author: aching
msg: Choose a zk list from a system property

author: aching
msg: Added features to build a jar with dependencies.  Set the jar location in maven.

author: aching
msg: Biggest feature is full implemented of a ZooKeeper startup/shutdown policy on the fly.  The servers are chosen on the fly and everyone is made aware of them.  Cleanup is automatic as well upon job success.  Features were added to allow the junit tests to be submitted to a real Hadoop configuration by setting VM system parameters.  Moved the TestSuperStepOnlyVertex class to examples.  Added new master cleanup (to get rid of znodes and files).  Changed from mapred.task.id to mapred.task.partition since its cleaner.
